content: जीवन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [जीव् भावे ल्युट्] Enlivening, giving life. --नः {@--1@} A living being. {@--2@} Wind. {@--3@} A son. {@--4@} The Supreme Being. --नं {@--1@} Life, existence; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); त्वमासे मम भूषणं त्वमसि मम जीवनं <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--2@} The principle of life, vital energy; <ls>Bg. 7. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Water; बीजानां प्रभव नमोऽस्तु जीवनाय <ls>Ki. 18. 39</ls>; or जीवनं जीवनं (life) हंति प्राणान् हंति समीरणः <ls>Udb.</ls> {@--4@} Livelihood, profession, means of existence (<ab>fig.</ab> also); <ls>Ms. 11. 77</ls>; विदुषां जीवनं मूर्खः <ls>H. 3. 33.</ls> {@--5@} Butter made from milk one day old. {@--6@} Marrow. {@--7@} Enlivening, making alive.
